title: Bowbear Mom & Me Lovely Matching Floral Apron
features: Long straps for a comfortable fit; can adjust to any body size. Triple layer ruffles at the bottom and a colorful floral pattern for a feminine look.
Great for cooking, baking, gardening and more. Makes a great Motherâ€™s Day gift, enjoy cooking and doing fun projects with your child.
Apron has a front pocket for tools or toys. Provides great coverage while doing house activities to keep clothes clean. Made out of cotton.
Adult Size: Length, 28 inches; Waist, 20.5 inches; Neck ties, 22.5 inches; Waist ties, 22.5 inches.
Child Size: Length, 19 inches; Waist, 12.5 inches; Neck ties, 17 inches; Waist ties, 17.5 inches. Child apron is recommended for ages 5 years and younger.
description: Dress your daughter up like you with these lovely floral aprons. The aprons are available as single aprons as well as a matching set for mother and child. The aprons feature a bright and colorful floral pattern as well as three ruffles at the bottom for a feminine look. A handy pocket will allow you to store cooking, cleaning, or gardening utensils you need, while your child can store toys in her pocket. A great way to bond with your child, you can cook, bake, garden, or do art activities together in these aprons without worrying about your clothes soiling.

title: the ruffles are the cherry on top - CUTE
